content.paragraph: Iterate over all packages starting from the active one and remove those wherefilterCallbackreturns false.
Iterate over all packages and runcallbackfor each starting from the active one.
Return the currently active AI package (ornilif there are no AI packages).
Return the target of the active package if the package has given type
Get list of targets of all packages of the given type.
Return whether the actor is fleeing.
Remove packages of given type (remove all packages if the type is not specified).
Start new AI package.

Iterate over all packages starting from the active one and remove those wherefilterCallbackreturns false.
#function filterCallback:
Iterate over all packages and runcallbackfor each starting from the active one.
The same asfilterPackage, but without removal.
#function callback:
Return the currently active AI package (ornilif there are no AI packages).
#Package:
Return the target of the active package if the package has given type

#string packageType: 
The expected type of the active package
openmw.core#GameObject:The target (can be nil if the package has no target or has another type)
Get list of targets of all packages of the given type.
#string packageType:
#list<openmw.core#GameObject>:
Return whether the actor is fleeing.
#boolean:
Remove packages of given type (remove all packages if the type is not specified).

#string packageType: 
(optional) The type of packages to remove.
Start new AI package.
